title: “Motown On Mondays” DJ Night (Madrone Art Bar)
description:
Submitted by the Event Organizer“Motown On Mondays” DJ Night (Madrone Art Bar)
Motown on Mondays
Every Monday at Madrone, dance the night away with hosts DJ Gordo Cabeza and guest DJS spinning originals, exclusive remixes, and close relatives of your favorite Motown songs during M.O.M. Motown on Mondays.
Motown on Mondays
Every Monday | 7 pm to 2 am
Madrone Art Bar, 500 Divisadero St. (at Fell), NoPa
FREE before 8 pm; $5 cover charge after. 21+
    
    
    
      
    
    

Updated 6/21/21 – Event info last checked via http://madroneartbar.com/calendar/website
